we're going to go ahead and add our

just going to let those spices sit there

actually might draw extra flavor than if
you just dump the spices on the meat can

that aside to cool to room temperature
and it's on to the lamb in a bowl I have

that's just regular California long

throw it in the fridge and chill until

just make like 45 degree angle stabs

throw the lid on make sure your oven is

basically we're just waiting for the

sorry about that but seriously you have
to put the lid back on and wait 30

then feel free to throw a couple rolls
